person.lastname: Ministry of Government Administration, Reform and Church Affairs

body.p: To show all employees in a unit, leave the name/phone number-field blank.
The Norwegian Ministry of Government Administration and Reform Postal adress: P.O. box 8004 Dep, NO-0030 Oslo, Norway Visiting address: Akersgata 59, Oslo E-mail:
If you need help in finding your way around the public administration or in finding publicly available information, you may contact

E-mail and other mail to the ministries is subject to the provisions of the Freedom of Information Act (Act of 19 June 1970 No. 69 relating to public access to documents in the public administration). This means that others may be able to access the content of your message. Do not include personal or other information in your message that you would not wish to become public knowledge.
